General.Name: Eagle Graphite Inc
General.Description: Eagle Graphite Incorporated, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of graphite properties in Canada. It offers natural flake graphite. The company holds interest in the Black Crystal project comprising a quarry and a plant with 6 mineral tenures covering an area of approximately 1,412 hectares of land located in the city of Nelson in British Columbia. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
